column2: "Not bad. Seeing you wield that rifle, it's like you're not even a newbie anymore."
"It seemed like just yesterday when I first started calling you Loser. And yet, now, it suddenly feels like ages ago."
"I'm going to be lonely at this rate..."
"Please! Please let me keep calling you Newbie--just a little longer!"
"Okay, great! See you next time, Newbie!"
